Address.value: 701 W MAIN STREET,SUITE 410, DURHAM, North Carolina, 27701, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: 374Water Inc is a social impact, cleantech company located in Durham, North Carolina. It offers an innovative technology that enables a circular economy and creation of a world without waste. Its mission is to preserve a clean and healthy environment that sustains life. The company applies cutting-edge science and engineering to recover resources from the wastes to keep drinking water clean.
